item.title: Profile
item.description: Short Bio (CV) Dr. Kaiyang Zhou is currently a Research Fellow at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, working with Prof. Ziwei Liu and Prof. Chen Change Loy. He received his PhD (2020) in computer science from the University of Surrey, UK, under the supervision of Prof. Tao Xiang. His research lies at the intersection of machine learning and computer vision, with specialization in domain generalization, transfer learning, and efficient deep learning.
